pages.text: $(li)The Swamp is a flooded Biome that is composed mainly by Mud, Grass, Clay and Water.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can find a lot of vegetation here like Red Mushrooms, Brown Mushrooms, Sugar Cane, Lilypads, Duckweed, Tall Cattails and Pickerelweed.

$(li)Some animals like Fireflies, Frogs, Perchs, Pikes, Squids and Crocodiles can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Swamp$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
